name: Attuned_Scourging_Blast_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to recover 5% endurance to nearby allies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 2 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
power_display_names: Scourging Blast: Recharge/Chance for Minor PBAoE +End, +Health (Corruptor)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Minor PBAoE +End, +Health
